results.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee
results.brief_description: Samantha Bee breaks up late-night’s all-male sausage fest with her nuanced view of political and cultural issues, her sharp interview skills, her repartee with world leaders and, of course, her 10-pound lady balls.

constellations_other.name: Fight for your right
constellations_other.description: Real world revolution and the fictional representations that reflect the struggle for equality in the past, present and dystopian future.

results.description: Samantha Bee breaks up late-night’s all-male sausage fest with her nuanced view of political and cultural issues, her sharp interview skills, her repartee with world leaders and, of course, her 10-pound lady balls.

results.title: Frozen II
results.creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Walt Disney Animation Studios, Jennifer Lee, Chris Buck and Lisa Keene
results.brief_description: Elsa, Anna, Kristoff and Olaf head far into the forest to learn the truth about an ancient mystery of their kingdom.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Pictures, Walt Disney Animation Studios, Jennifer Lee, Chris Buck and Lisa Keene
results.description:
Disney’s fierce princess sisters Elsa and Anna are back in the sequel to the worldwide phenomenon Frozen (2013). Three years after saving Arendelle from Elsa’s uncontrollable, arctic powers and proving the love of family can warm the coldest hearts, the sisters learn of an enchanted forest whose elemental spirits are accidentally awakened to wreak havoc on their kingdom. To once again save the day, Elsa and Anna embark on an epic journey with Kristoff, Olaf and Sven to uncover the source of Elsa’s powers and discover a devastating family secret.

Building on the $1.2 billion dollar success of the first film, Frozen II (2018) likewise avalanched across the globe. With all the main cast reprising their roles, including Idina Menzel and Kristen Bell, and featuring brand-new songs, Frozen II became the second highest-grossing animated feature in history, just behind Disney’s The Lion King (2019).

Charting the growth of the princesses from the first film, the character designers came up with new looks (as well as the technology to make them) to demonstrate their evolution. The concept art above is an early illustration of a key scene where Elsa hears the siren song of the enchanted forest calling to her. As she’s awoken in the middle of the night, Elsa wears an ethereal magenta nightgown and her iconic braid from the first film appears more casual – after all, she’s been asleep. Small details are important. In the first film, when Elsa retreated from the world, her hair was tightly confined to a bun until she “Let It Go”. Likewise, Elsa’s hair becomes freer as she discovers more about herself after the performance of “Into the Unknown” from this scene.
description_for_label:

To once again save the day, Elsa and Anna embark on an epic journey with Kristoff, Olaf and Sven to uncover the source of Elsa’s powers and discover a devastating family secret.

Building on the $1.2 billion dollar success of the first film, Frozen II (2018) likewise avalanched across the globe. With all the main cast reprising their roles, including Idina Menzel and Kristen Bell, and featuring brand-new songs, Frozen II became the second highest-grossing animated feature in history, just behind Disney’s The Lion King (2019).

Charting the growth of the princesses from the first film, the character designers came up with new looks (as well as the technology to make them) to demonstrate their evolution. The concept art above is an early illustration of a key scene where Elsa hears the siren song of the enchanted forest calling to her. As she’s awoken in the middle of the night, Elsa wears an ethereal magenta nightgown and her iconic braid from the first film appears more casual – after all, she’s been asleep. Likewise, Elsa’s hair becomes freer as she discovers more about herself after the performance of “Into the Unknown” from this scene.

results.title: Fraggle Rock
results.brief_description: The Fraggles are a fun-loving community of creatures who live in a subterranean fantasy land where they love to play, sing and dance their cares away, sharing their world with the tiny Doozers and the giant Gorgs. The series teaches empathy and tolerance and encourages children to understand people different from themselves.

constellations_other.name: Pen names, poems and puppets
constellations_other.description: Discover how big-screen adaptations of novels connect to web-based poetry and Jim Henson's Fraggle Rock.

results.description: The Fraggles are a fun-loving community of creatures who live in a subterranean fantasy land where they love to play, sing and dance their cares away, sharing their world with the tiny Doozers and the giant Gorgs. results.title: Four Jills in a Jeep
results.creator_credit: 20th Century Fox, Robert Ellis, William A. Seiter, Helen Logan and Snag Werris
results.brief_description: Reenactments of actual USO experiences of its female stars entertaining troops overseas.

results.title: For Sama
results.creator_credit: ITN Productions, PBS Frontline, Channel 4 News, Waad al-Kateab and Edward Watts
results.headline_credit: Syrian Arab Republic, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2019
results.brief_description: A love letter from a young mother to her daughter, the film tells the story of Waad al-Kateab’s life through five years of the uprising in Aleppo, Syria as she falls in love, gets married and gives birth to Sama, all while cataclysmic conflict rises around her.

constellations_other.name: Cities under siege
constellations_other.description: The Syrian Civil War is an ongoing conflict that is arguably the most documented in history, with images and videos captured by journalists, activists, combatants and victims.

results.creator_credit_for_label: ITN Productions, PBS Frontline, Channel 4 News, Waad al-Kateab and Edward Watts
results.headline_credit_for_label: Syrian Arab Republic, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2019
results.description: A love letter from a young mother to her daughter, the film tells the story of Waad al-Kateab’s life through five years of the uprising in Aleppo, Syria as she falls in love, gets married and gives birth to Sama, all while cataclysmic conflict rises around her. Her camera captures incredible stories of loss, laughter and survival as Waad wrestles with an impossible choice– whether or not to flee the city to protect her daughter’s life, when leaving means abandoning the struggle for freedom for which she has already sacrificed so much.
description_for_label: A love letter from a young mother to her daughter, the film tells the story of Waad al-Kateab’s life through five years of the uprising in Aleppo, Syria as she falls in love, gets married and gives birth to Sama, all while cataclysmic conflict rises around her. Her camera captures incredible stories of loss, laughter and survival as Waad wrestles with an impossible choice– whether or not to flee the city to protect her daughter’s life, when leaving means abandoning the struggle for freedom for which she has already sacrificed so much.

results.title: Flying Down to Rio
results.creator_credit: RKO Radio Pictures, Walter Plunkett, Cyril Hume, Erwin S. Gelsey, Thornton Freeland, Irene, H.W. Hanemann and Lou Brock
results.brief_description: A dance band leader finds love and success in Brazil.

constellations_other.name: Shadow play
constellations_other.description: Shadow play uses light and projection to tell stories – fundamentals that would evolve into cinematography. In the Wayang tradition, gunungan open and close performances and indicate scene changes and the puppets pass across the projection screen in a similar way to a wipe transition.

results.creator_credit_for_label: RKO Radio Pictures, Walter Plunkett, Cyril Hume, Erwin S. Gelsey, Thornton Freeland, Irene, H.W. Hanemann and Lou Brock
results.description: A dance band leader finds love and success in Brazil.
description_for_label: A dance band leader finds love and success in Brazil.

results.title: Flowers and Trees
results.brief_description: Flowers and Trees is a 1932 Silly Symphonies cartoon produced by Walt Disney, directed by Burt Gillett, and released on July 30, 1932. It was the first commercially released film to be produced in the full-color three-strip Technicolor process.

constellations_other.name: Over the Technicolor rainbow
constellations_other.description: This Constellation explores the beginning and legacy of Technicolor and was created by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies students Adam Virgona and Kristian Vass.

results.description: A jealous stump threatens two trees that are in love by starting a forest fire. When the rain comes and puts out the fire the forest revives and celebrates the wedding.
description_for_label: A jealous stump threatens two trees that are in love by starting a forest fire. When the rain comes and puts out the fire the forest revives and celebrates the wedding.

results.title: Flipper
results.brief_description: Flipper is an American revival television series of the original 1964 Flipper television series. The first two seasons aired in first-run syndication; seasons 3 and 4 aired on the PAX network.

constellations_other.name: The dolphin Constellation
constellations_other.description: This Constellation echoes representations of dolphins across screen media.

results.description:
Flipper, is an American revival television series of the original 1964 Flipper television series. The first two seasons aired in first-run syndication; seasons 3 and 4 aired on the PAX network.

The 1995 version brought back Bud Ricks as a scientist doing marine research in Florida. The dolphin Flipper was one with whom Dr. Ricks was working. This TV show is available for online viewing on hulu in the United States and at Rogers On Demand in Canada.

Although the show was set in Bal Harbour, Florida, it was largely filmed in Gold Coast, Queensland, Australia. However three episodes during the first season, including the pilot, were filmed in Pigeon Key, Florida and at the Dolphin Research Center in Grassy Key, Florida.
description_for_label:
Flipper, is an American revival television series of the original 1964 Flipper television series. The first two seasons aired in first-run syndication; seasons 3 and 4 aired on the PAX network.

The 1995 version brought back Bud Ricks as a scientist doing marine research in Florida. The dolphin Flipper was one with whom Dr. Ricks was working. This TV show is available for online viewing on hulu in the United States and at Rogers On Demand in Canada.

Although the show was set in Bal Harbour, Florida, it was largely filmed in Gold Coast, Queensland, Australia. However three episodes during the first season, including the pilot, were filmed in Pigeon Key, Florida and at the Dolphin Research Center in Grassy Key, Florida.

results.title: Flipper
results.brief_description: Flipper,/i>, from Ivan Tors Films in association with Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Television, is an American television program first broadcast on NBC from September 19, 1964, until April 15, 1967.

constellations_other.name: The dolphin Constellation
constellations_other.description: This Constellation echoes representations of dolphins across screen media.

results.description: Flipper, from Ivan Tors Films in association with Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Television, is an American television program first broadcast on NBC from September 19, 1964, until April 15, 1967. Flipper, a bottlenose dolphin, is the companion animal of Porter Ricks, Chief Warden at fictional Coral Key Park and Marine Preserve in southern Florida, and his two young sons, Sandy and Bud. The show has been dubbed an “aquatic Lassie”, and a considerable amount of juvenile merchandise inspired by the show was produced during its first-run.
description_for_label: Flipper, from Ivan Tors Films in association with Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Television, is an American television program first broadcast on NBC from September 19, 1964, until April 15, 1967. Flipper, a bottlenose dolphin, is the companion animal of Porter Ricks, Chief Warden at fictional Coral Key Park and Marine Preserve in southern Florida, and his two young sons, Sandy and Bud. The show has been dubbed an “aquatic Lassie”, and a considerable amount of juvenile merchandise inspired by the show was produced during its first-run.

results.title: Fleabag
results.brief_description: Fleabag is thrown roughly up against the walls of contemporary London, sleeping with anyone who dares to stand too close, squeezing money from wherever she can, rejecting anyone who tries to help her, and keeping up her bravado throughout.

constellations_other.name: Gunslingers, good fellas and flea bags
constellations_other.description: Explore how a 1903 western changed the course of filmmaking and videogames by breaking the fourth wall.
